title: WTB T206 Red Cobbs in VGEX-EX Condition
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Red Cobbs in VGEX-EX Condition
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following T206 Red Cobbs.. please PM or email me if you have any available.. if SGC graded I would look for a 5 only... if PSA graded I would be ok with a 4 or 5. 

Paying top dollar. 

  * SC 460 Fact 42 no OP 
  * SC 460 Fact 42 with OP 
  * Pied 460 Fact 42 
  * Old Mill 
  * Cycle 350
  * EPDG 
  * Carolina Brights (ok about VG grade or higher)
  * Lenox  (ok about VG grade or higher)
